arm_group.description: newborns will be tested if they were affected by Pompe disease

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to test the feasibility of a newborn screen assay for Pompe
      disease

clinical_study.brief_title: Newborn Screening Assay of Pompe's Disease

detailed_description.textblock:
DBS from newborn will be tested for acid alpha-glucosidase (GAA) activity. Babies with low
      GAA activity will be confirmed for Pompe disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  newborns receiving newborn screening in Newborn Screening center of National Taiwan
             Univeristy Hospital

          -  parents signed inform consent for this study

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

intervention.description: DBS will be tested for acid alpha-glucosidase (GAA)activity. Newborns with low GAA activity will received a confirmatory blood sampling and clinical evaluation for the presence of cardiomyopathy.

clinical_study.official_title: Newborn Screening Assay of Pompe's Disease

primary_outcome.measure: detect patients with infantile onset Pompe disease

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Screening
